pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Decade (2009, TV show)$(br2)Used by $(l:decade/riders/diend#diend)Kamen Rider Diend$(/l)$(br2)Used to obtain Diend's $(l:decade/devices/diend_belt)Diend Belt$(/l)$(br2)Can store up to 3 $(l:decade/items/kamenride_cards)KamenRide Cards$(/l) for Rider summoning
